tagBITMAPFILEHEADER Struct Reference

#include <GRRLIB.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

u16 bfType
u32 bfSize
u16 bfReserved1
u16 bfReserved2
u32 bfOffBits

Detailed Description

This structure contains information about the type, size, and layout of a file that containing a device-independent bitmap (DIB).

Member Data Documentation

u32 tagBITMAPFILEHEADER::bfOffBits

Specifies the offset, in bytes, from the BITMAPFILEHEADER structure to the bitmap bits.

u16 tagBITMAPFILEHEADER::bfReserved1

Reserved; set to zero.

u16 tagBITMAPFILEHEADER::bfReserved2

Reserved; set to zero.

u32 tagBITMAPFILEHEADER::bfSize

Specifies the size, in bytes, of the bitmap file.

u16 tagBITMAPFILEHEADER::bfType

Specifies the file type. It must be set to the signature word BM (0x4D42) to indicate bitmap.
